EmailTemplate.subject: Holiday Hours for Presidents' Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Technical Services Communciation Holiday Hours for Presidents' Day POSTED: 2-12-13
Dear clients,
In observance of the upcoming holiday, the TriTech Software Systems corporate office will be closed Monday, February 18, 2013. During this time, our on-call Technical Services and Engineering staff will provide support services for urgent issues.
If your system has a serious problem during the holidays (including daytime hours), please call 1-800-VISICAD and an on-call Support Team member will contact you to work on your issue. If for any reason the 1-800-VISICAD line is not functioning, you can reach us via our backup-line at 858-229-8786.
If your issue is not urgent, please submit your issue electronically (SalesForce or e-mail) or contact us during our regular business hours.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor - Inform | Decorah, IA Direct: (563) 387.4813 l Mobile: (563) 419.8766 Fax: (563) 387.9335 l Support: (800) 847.4223
Support Website: SalesForce.com <https://na6.salesforce.com/secur/login_portal.jsp?orgId=00D80000000arem&portalId=06080000000QwMW>
